project.name: base-parent
project.description: Base Maven Parent solving majority of Maven configurations. Use this to drive your maven builds.

fluido.version.note: Make sure to update in site.xml

bannedDependencies.message: Do not use obsolete logging libraries. Prefer slf4j/logback and override slf4j libraries for replacements

requirePluginVersions.message: [ERROR] Best Practice is to always define plugin versions!
